plain_text:
United States Court of Appeals
                     For the First Circuit


No. 05-2898
                    UNITED STATES OF AMERICA,

                            Appellee,

                               v.

                         MARK ROLFSEMA,

                      Defendant, Appellant.



                          ERRATA SHEET


     The opinion of this Court issued on November 17, 2006, is
amended as follows:

     On page 4, line 22, "2G2.4(b)(4)" should be replaced with
"2G2.4(b)(2)"

     On page 5, lines 9-10, "2G2.4(5)(D)" should be replaced with
"2G2.4(b)(5)(D)"

     On page 5, line 11, "2G2.4(b)(2)" should be replaced with
"2G2.4(b)(5)(D)"

     On page 12, lines 9-10, "2G2.4(b)(5)(d)" should be replaced
with "2G2.4(b)(5)(D)"
